title: nambuvOm nalamuravE
sahitya:
nambuvOm nalamuravE embirAn muruganaiyE


anupallavi

  immaiyODu marumayil em vAzhvu tAzhvurAdu inba sukha bhOgam eidi tunbamurAdu uyyavE


caraNam    ambalavANar magizh arumaik-kumAranai lambOdara sOdaranai lAvaNya svarUpanai
umbar uyya sUranai samharitta vIranai immAnilattOrin iNaiyilAt-tuNaivanai
